tip1: Check tasks on the go wit' th' Habitica mobile apps.
tip2: Click any equipment t' see a preview, or equip it instantly by clickin' th' star in its upper-left corner!
tip3: Use emoji to quickly differentiate between yer tasks.
tip4: Use th' # sign before a task name t' make it really big!
tip5: It’s best to use skills that cause buffs in th' morning so they last longer.
tip6: Hover over a task and click th' dots t' access advanced task controls, such as th' ability t' push tasks t' th' top/bottom o' yer list.
tip7: Some backgrounds connect perfectly if Party members use th' same background. Ex: Mountain Lake, Pagodas, n' Rolling Hills.
tip8: Send a Message t' someone by clicking their name in chat n' then clicking th' envelope icon at th' top o' their profile!
tip9: Use th' filters + search bar in th' Inventories, Shops, Fleets, and Challenges to quickly find what you want.
tip10: Ye can win sapphires by competing in Challenges. New ones are added every day!
tip11: Havin' more than four Crew members increases accountability!
tip12: Add checklists t' yer To-Dos t' multiply yer rewards!
tip13: Click “Tags” on yer task page t' make an unwieldy task list very manageable!
tip14: Ye can add headers or inspirational quotes t' yer list as Habits wit' no (+/-).
tip15: Complete all th' Masterclasser Adventure-lines t' learn about Habitica’s secret lore.
tip16: Click th' link t' th' Data Display Tool in th' footer fer valuable insights on yer progress.
tip17: Use th' mobile apps t' set reminders fer yer tasks.
tip18: Habits that are just positive or just negative gradually “fade” n' return t' yellow.
tip19: Boost yer Intelligence Stat t' gain more experience when ye complete a task.
tip20: Boost yer Perception Stat t' get more drops n' gold.
tip21: Boost yer Strength Stat t' do more boss damage or get critical hits.
tip22: Boost yer Constitution Stat t' lessen th' damage from incomplete Dailies.
tip23: Reach level 100 t' unlock the Orb of Rebirth fer free n' start a new adventure!
tip24: 'Ave a question? Ask in th' Habitica Help Guild!
tip25: Th' four seas'nal Grand Galas start near th' solstices n' equinoxes.
tip26: Ye can look fer a Crew or find Crew members in th' Party Wanted Guild!
tip27: Did a Daily yesterday, but forgot t' check it off? Don't worry! Wit' Record Yesterday's Activity, ye'll 'ave a chance t' log wha' ye did afore startin' yer new day.
tip28: Set a Custom Day Start under User Icon > Settin's t' control when yer day restarts.
tip29: Complete all yer Dailies t' get a Perfect Day Buff that increases yer Stats!
tip30: Ye can invite mates t' Ships, not just Ships.
tip31: Check out th' pre-made lists in th' Library o' Tasks n' Challenges Guild fer example tasks.
tip32: Lots o' Habitica’s code, art, n' writing be made by volunteer contributors! Head t' th' Aspiring Legends Guild t' help.
tip33: Check out The Bulletin Board Guild fer news about Fleets, Challenges, n' other player-created events - n' announce yer own there!
tip34: Occasionally re-evaluate yer tasks t' make sure they’re up-to-date!
tip35: Users who are part o' a Ship Plan gain th' ability t' assign tasks t' other users in that Ship fer extra task management n' accountability.
